attributes.action: Give all homeless charities £1000 pounds so they can help homelessness.
attributes.additional_details: Charities could make the number of homeless people decrease and if they had £1000 they could do it
attributes.background: I want this done because there are so many homeless people in the uk. Whenever I walk to the shops I see them... Helpless, cold and hungry. The majority of people will ignore them but there are some kind people who donate and help them. They are treated as inhumane.
